TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TypedDataSetGenerator extends System.Object

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Data.TypedDataSetGenerator> class takes information provided (for example, an XML schema) and creates a typed dataset class.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string Generate (System.Data.DataSet dataSet, System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace codeNamespace, System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider codeProvider);

.method public static hidebysig string Generate(class System.Data.DataSet dataSet, class System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace codeNamespace, class System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider codeProvider) cil managed

Docs.param: The source that specifies the metadata for the typed .
The namespace that provides the target namespace for the typed .
The language-specific to use to generate the dataset.
Docs.summary: Generates a strongly typed based on an existing .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Generates a strongly typed <xref:System.Data.DataSet>. The dataset is created in the namespace indicated in the `codeNamespace` parameter, and the dataset is generated in the managed programming language indicated in the `codeProvider` parameter.

## Remarks
> [!IMPORTANT] > Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. Call this method only with trusted data. For more information, see [Untrusted Data Security Risks](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetProviderName (string inputFileContent, string tableName);
.method public static hidebysig string GetProviderName(string inputFileContent, string tableName) cil managed

Docs.param: A string that represents the XML schema to base the on.
A string that represents the name of the table to return the provider name from.
Docs.summary: Returns the provider name for the in the input file.
Docs.returns: A string that represents the provider name for the specific table passed in to the parameter.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!IMPORTANT] > Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. Call this method only with trusted data. For more information, see [Untrusted Data Security Risks](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).
Returns the provider name for the given `tableName` in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<System.Reflection.Assembly> ReferencedAssemblies { get; }
.property class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class System.Reflection.Assembly> ReferencedAssemblies

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the collection of assemblies referenced in a typed dataset.
Docs.value: A collection containing all referenced assemblies in the dataset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The generator iterates over this list and adds the assemblies to your project.
